doc.field: This series includes analog and digital recordings of Hot Peaches show performances, benefits, and readings dating from the early 1970s to the 2000s. Recordings in this series are a combination of shows performed in New York, including The Heat, Gay?, and Divas of Sheridan Square as well as European tour performances in London and Berlin including The Heat and Concentrated Camp. This series also contains the Marsha P Johnson documentary Pay It No Mind; video clips highlighting individual cast members; compilations of Hot Peaches shows; and the film Hot Peaches Retrospective, a documentary film containing interviews with the Jimmy Camicia, performance footage, and interviews with cast members. Recordings of Hot Peaches fundraisers to assistance friend in their community include footage for the Break a Leg Gala Benefit for Hot Peaches cast member Ian McKay in 1981, and Chrysis in Heels benefit for former cast member International Chrysis in 1990.
